ingredients.name: maraschino liqueur

cocktails.notes: You must use fresh-pressed, unpasteurized cider. The pasteurization ruins the drink.

2 dashes orange bitters

cocktails.name: Egg nog
cocktails.notes:
Blend the eggs, slowly add the sugar. With the blender running, add nutmeg and all liquid ingredients. Chill thoroughly, even overnight.
        
From http://www.jeffreymorgenthaler.com/2009/egg-nog/
cocktails.recipe_items_blob:
6 oz whole milk
4 oz heavy cream
3 oz sugar
2 oz apricot brandy
2 eggs
2 oz spiced rum
1/2 tsp nutmeg
